programme.title: 48 Hours
programme.desc: This newsmagazine investigates intriguing crime and justice cases that touch on all aspects of the human experience. Over its long run, the show has helped exonerate wrongly convicted people, driven the reopening -- and resolution -- of cold cases, and changed numerous lives. CBS News correspondents offer an in-depth look into each story, with the emphasis on solving the mystery at its heart. The program and its team have earned critical acclaim, including multiple Emmy, Peabody and Edward R. Murrow Awards.

programme.title: Victoria Gotti: My Father's Daughter
programme.desc: Delving into the tumultuous world of Victoria Gotti and her life as the daughter of mob boss John Gotti.

programme.title: Obsessed
programme.desc: A woman (Jenna Elfman) claims she had an affair with a married neurosurgeon and stands trial for allegedly harassing him.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
programme.desc: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom brings you thrills and excitement. Indy, his sidekick Short Round and nightclub singer Willie Scott go from high-flying action above the Himalayas to a spine-tingling escape from a fortress-like mine in India.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade
programme.desc: There's nothing more exciting than trying to keep up with the Joneses in Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade. Indy's Nazi enemies are back and have kidnapped his father, in their effort to locate the sacred Holy Grail.

programme.title: Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
programme.desc: STEVEN SPIELBERG and GEORGE LUCAS bring you the greatest adventurer of all time! Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull finds Indy trying to outrace a brilliant and beautiful agent for the mystical, all-powerful crystal skull of Akator.

programme.title: Transformers
programme.desc: Two years after he and his Autobot friends saved the Earth from the Decepticons, Sam Witwicky (Shia LaBeouf) faces a new battle: college. Meanwhile, Optimus Prime and the Autobots are working with a secret military organization and trying to make a home for themselves on Earth. When an ancient Decepticon known as The Fallen rises up to wreak vengeance, Sam and his girlfriend, Mikaela, must figure out the history of the Transformers on Earth and find a way to defeat The Fallen once and for all.

programme.title: Transformers
programme.desc: After an epic battle, a great city lies in ruins, but the Earth itself is saved. As humanity begins to pick up the pieces, a shadowy group emerges to try to take control of history. Meanwhile, an ancient and powerful new menace sets its sights on Earth. A new group of humans, led by Cade Yeager (Mark Wahlberg), helps Optimus Prime (Peter Cullen) and the Autobots rise up to meet their most fearsome challenge yet: a worldwide war of good versus evil.

programme.title: Mission: Impossible
programme.desc: When U.S. government operative Ethan Hunt (Tom Cruise) and his mentor, Jim Phelps (Jon Voight), go on a covert assignment that takes a disastrous turn, Jim is killed, and Ethan becomes the prime murder suspect. Now a fugitive, Hunt recruits brilliant hacker Luther Stickell (Ving Rhames) and maverick pilot Franz Krieger (Jean Reno) to help him sneak into a heavily guarded CIA building to retrieve a confidential computer file that will prove his innocence.

programme.title: Random Hearts
programme.desc: After a plane crash in which both their spouses are killed, Sergeant Dutch Van Den Broeck (Harrison Ford) and Congresswoman Kay Chandler's (Kristin Scott Thomas) lives are connected. Their spouses were headed to the same address, with identical keys, under Mr. and Mrs. plane tickets. The investigation leads to startling discoveries and an unexpected romance.

programme.title: Premium Rush
programme.desc: For bike messenger Wilee (Joseph Gordon-Levitt), dodging speeding cars, evading crazy cabdrivers, and blowing by millions of cranky pedestrians is all in a day's work. Wilee is one of the best in a dangerous job, and his bike of choice is a Fixie, a lightweight, single-gear unit without brakes. Though Wilee knows that one day he may end up as a smear on the pavement -- he is unprepared for what happens after his last run of the day turns into a life-or-death chase through Manhattan.

programme.title: Race the Sun
programme.desc: Sandra (Halle Berry), the new science teacher at a poor Hawaiian high school, finds the students surly and unmotivated. So she handpicks eight of them, including artistic Daniel (Casey Affleck) and his hedonistic stepsister, Cindy (Eliza Dushku), and guides them in the design and construction of a solar-powered car. After their unorthodox vehicle wins the Hawaiian championship, they travel to Australia to compete in a dangerous 2000-mile trek across the outback.

programme.title: North
programme.desc: North (Elijah Wood) is a talented and bright kid, but his mom (Julia Louis-Dreyfus) and dad (Jason Alexander) are utterly preoccupied with other things in their lives, leaving him largely ignored. Advised by a mysterious man (Bruce Willis) who pops up on occasion, North decides to legally separate himself from his parents and goes on a search across the globe for the ideal mother and father. Unfortunately for the young boy, most of the people that he meets have very little potential.

programme.title: On the Waterfront
programme.desc: Dockworker Terry Malloy (Marlon Brando) had been an up-and-coming boxer until powerful local mob boss Johnny Friendly (Lee J. Cobb) persuaded him to throw a fight. When a longshoreman is murdered before he can testify about Friendly's control of the Hoboken waterfront, Terry teams up with the dead man's sister Edie (Eva Marie Saint) and the streetwise priest Father Barry (Karl Malden) to testify himself, against the advice of Friendly's lawyer, Terry's older brother Charley (Rod Steiger).

programme.title: Gidget Grows Up
programme.desc: Gidget (Karen Valentine) goes to New York, becomes a U.N. guide and meets an older man (Edward Mulhare).

programme.title: American Madness
programme.desc: During the Depression, the bank owned by generous Dickson (Walter Huston) is barely staying afloat, and things get worse when $100,000 is lifted from the vault. Fingers are pointed at reformed crook Matt (Pat O'Brien), who got a job and a fresh start from Dickson. The innocent Matt can clear his name by admitting that on the night of the robbery he was breaking up a tryst between Dickson's wife and another teller. But this revelation may crush Dickson, and Matt's conscience plays tug-of-war.

programme.title: Born Free
programme.desc: At a national park in Kenya, English game warden George Adamson (Bill Travers) and his wife, Joy (Virginia McKenna), care for three orphaned lion cubs. After the two larger lions are shipped off to a zoo in the Netherlands, the smallest of the three, Elsa, stays with the couple. When Elsa is blamed for causing an elephant stampede in the nearby village, head warden John Kendall (Geoffrey Keen) demands the young lion either be trained to survive in the wilds of the Serengeti or be sent to a zoo.

programme.title: Mission
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt, a secret agent, is framed for the deaths of his espionage team and attempts to flee government assassins after him. He races against the clock in order to discover the truth.

programme.title: Mission
programme.desc: The world's greatest spy, Ethan Hunt, returns and partners up with the beautiful Nyah Hall to stop renegade agent Sean Ambrose from releasing a new kind of terror on an unsuspecting world.

programme.title: Mission
programme.desc: Ethan Hunt hurdles into spectacular new adventures from Rome to Shanghai as he races to rescue a captured agent and stop Davian from eliminating his next target, Ethan's wife.

programme.title: Jet Li's Fearless
programme.desc: After a terrible tragedy, a martial artist (Jet Li) retreats to a remote village to gain a new appreciation for the important things in life, but when he returns to the city to reconcile his past with the present, he gets caught up in a duel to the death defending China's honor.

programme.title: Smokey and the Bandit Part 3
programme.desc: In this sequel, Big Enos Burdette (Pat McCormick) and his son, Little Enos (Paul Williams), make an unconventional deal by hiring bandit-hunting Sheriff Buford T. Justice (Jackie Gleason) to haul unusual cargo from Miami to their new Texas seafood restaurant. Intent on seeing that Buford has a tough time of it, however, they also recruit the rebellious Cledus Snow (Jerry Reed) and the lovely Dusty Trails (Colleen Camp) to make the lawman's trip less than smooth.

programme.title: The Real McCoy
programme.desc: After a decade behind bars, former burglar Karen McCoy (Kim Basinger) simply wants to earn a legitimate living to support her son (Zach English) -- but as the best bank robber around, she's in high demand in the criminal underworld. When Atlanta crime boss Jack Schmidt (Terence Stamp) discovers her intention to go straight, he kidnaps her son to force her into one last job. Teaming up with an amateur (Val Kilmer), McCoy has to use all her cunning to pull off this heist and save her son.

programme.title: A Simple Wish
programme.desc: Eight-year-old Annabel (Mara Wilson) is rooting for her father, Oliver (Robert Pastorelli), to get the lead part in a new musical, but he doesn't have the same name recognition as arrogant actor Tony Sable (Alan Campbell). When Murray (Martin Short), the first-ever male fairy godmother, is sent to help Annabel, he bungles the wish badly and turns her dad into a statue in Central Park. Meanwhile, evil Claudia (Kathleen Turner), long forbidden the use of magic due to her greed, plots revenge.

programme.title: Holiday Engagement
programme.desc: Hillary Burns (Somerville) is always struggling in life and love while constantly feeling the pressure to marry from her demanding mother, Meredith (Long).

programme.title: Santa Fake
programme.desc: Santa Fake is a musical comedy filled with Christmas spirit and holiday hijinks.

programme.title: The Christmas Kid
programme.desc: A take on Home Alone British style where the main character is all grown up now.

programme.title: Christmas Survival
programme.desc: Sisters, Miranda (Gemma Whelan, "Game of Thrones") and Lyla (Joely Richardson) come together for Christmas in this heart-warming holiday comedy. However, ancient sibling rivalries flare-up to sabotage the hope for a season of good will.

programme.title: Pure Country 2: The Gift
programme.desc: Three angels bestow the gift of song to a young girl, who rises to fame and fortune as a country music star.

programme.title: Stagecoach The Texas Jack Story

programme.title: Marionette
programme.desc: A man who calls himself Master sends mysterious texts with images of young women that they don't remember taking. A teacher and a former detective become involved in the escalating series of crimes.

programme.title: The Outlaws
programme.desc: A fearless detective Seok-do decides to hunt down Jang Chen, a cold-blooded boss of Heuksapa, an uprising criminal organization that turned Seoul's Chinatown into a blood bath. Seok-do is an old-school detective with bravado who has been protecting the peace of his city with his strong fists and bold spirit. Together with team, Seok-do plans an ultimate crime sweep to take down Jang Chen's gangs in one night.

programme.title: Toxic Friendz
programme.desc: When an average, anti-social, woman gets tired of going through the motions of her daily life, she reluctantly decides to attend her company's Halloween Party. As the night goes along, debauchery ensues, revealing secrets and revelations about herself. Reality blurs, friendships shatter, but who's the real villain?

programme.title: Cougar
programme.desc: Donna and her young college son Brandon live in a nice suburban area of Atlanta, until a new and mysterious older woman moves in next door. Donna invites her over to dinner where she and Brandon connect, and build a connection that is deadly and manipulative. A mother must save her son before it's too late.

programme.title: The Foreign Exchange Student

programme.desc: A lone gunslinger, Jack McCall (George Montgomery), bursts into a saloon and shoots dead the legendary Wild Bill Hickok (Douglas Kennedy). Arrested and put on trial, McCall recounts a twisted tale that paints Hickok as anything but heroic, explaining how Hickok and McCall's cousin Bat (James Seay) took over McCall's family's plantation, killed his parents and even framed him for crimes he didn't commit. McCall's cold-blooded killing of Hickok was warranted. Or was it?

Stoked on the untested chemical, Eddie rises to the top of the financial world and attracts the attention of a tycoon (Robert De Niro) who intends to use him to make a fortune. But terrible side-effects and a dwindling supply threaten to collapse Eddie's house of cards.

programme.title: Europe's Greatest Train Journeys

programme.title: Europe's Greatest Train Journeys

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's Railway Vietnam
programme.sub-title: Secret Family Recipies in Ho Chi Minh
programme.desc: Luke searches to find Ho Chi Minh's old markets before they disappear due to District 1's rapid development. Join Luke as he gathers fresh ingredients from a local market, tries some traditional delicacies, and follows his sweet tooth to Marou.

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's Railway Vietnam

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's Railway Vietnam
programme.sub-title: Fiery Chili Sauce in Hoi An

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's Railway Vietnam

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's Railway Vietnam
programme.sub-title: Tasty Ant Eggs in Ninh Binh

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's Railway Vietnam

programme.title: Luke Nguyen's Railway Vietnam

programme.title: Barn Find Hunter | Massive stash of cars in old car dealership
programme.desc: Tom Cotter gets a tour of an enormous "museum" of forgotten cars stashed in a defunct car dealership. Tom's next stop reveals a rare Corvair, a large collection of Mazdas, and a rare "Alfa Jr."

programme.title: The Driver's Seat w/ Henry Catchpole
programme.sub-title: The Rocketeer MX-V6 and new Renault 5 E-Tech
programme.desc: Automotive journalist Henry Catchpole drives the incredible Rocketeer MX-V6, a naturally aspirated, V-6 powered Mazda MX-5 Miata restomod. Next, Henry jumps in the new Renault 5 E-Tech: an affordable, fun EV for the masses?

programme.title: The Driver's Seat with Henry Catchpole | A trio of incredible Mercedes sports cars
programme.desc: Henry drives Mercedes' SLS AMG Black Series and AMG GT Black Series, two of the wildest, rarest, most expensive cars ever to emerge from Affalterbach. Next, another famous Merc takes center stage as Henry reviews the McLaren Mercedes SLR HDK.

programme.title: Barn Find Hunter | Broncos, Galaxies and a lifted Grand Wagoneer
programme.desc: Tom Cotter finds all sorts of interesting vehicles on a trip to Northern Michigan, from Ford Broncos to a unique Ford Galaxie. Speaking of Galaxies, hang around for a look at a Galaxie 500 that is back on the road after being a "barn find" itself!

programme.title: Barn Find Hunter | Muscle Car Dreamland and Elvis' Lincoln Continental
programme.desc: Tom Cotter finds a stash of muscle cars in Georgia before discovering an interesting Lincoln Continental that possibly belonged to Elvis Presley.

programme.title: Chip Foose Draws a Car
programme.sub-title: Split-window Chevy Corvette and Jaguar E-Type
programme.desc: Part 1: Chip Foose customizes one of his dream cars: the 1963 split-window Chevy Corvette. Part 2: Chip Foose transforms the classic Jaguar E-type coupe into a streetwise sports car with even sleeker design elements.

programme.title: Revelations with Jason Cammisa | Porsche Stories: The new 911 GT3 and wild history of the 924
programme.desc: In this episode of Revelations, Jason Cammisa argues why the Porsche GT3 is now, unquestionably, the most important car in the 911 lineup. Next, Jason explores the wild history of the Porsche 924 and why it was never meant to be a Porsche.

programme.title: Capturing Car Culture w/ Larry Chen | Ultimate 90's JDM cars and McLaren drift car
programme.desc: Larry Chen meets up with Emelia Hartford to cruise around in some amazing 1990's JDM classics. Next, Larry meets up with Andy Gray and his WILD McLaren MP4-12C GT3 drift car.

programme.title: The Appraiser | Hertz 1966 GT350, and a 700HP Shelby GT500
programme.desc: Shelby expert Colin Comer appraises a 1966 Shelby GT350 Hertz car with a period-correct Paxton Supercharger. And if that's not enough Carroll Shelby for you, Colin checks out a 700HP 1967 Shelby GT500 with TWO Paxton superchargers!

programme.title: Barn Find Hunter | Ultimate BMW barn find, and a family feud over a "secret Chevy"
programme.desc: A Triumph Stag on a dead end road that leads Tom to a treasure trove of forgotten vacation cars hidden in 100-year-old barns. Next, we get the story of a family feud that caused a classic Chevy to be hidden away for decades.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop
programme.desc: After his childhood buddy is murdered while visiting Detroit, rebellious cop Axel Foley (Eddie Murphy) follows the leads to Beverly Hills, Calif., under the auspices of a vacation. He checks in with old friend Jenny Summers (Lisa Eilbacher) and starts to believe her boss, art dealer Victor Maitland (Steven Berkoff), might somehow be involved in the murder. However, Lt. Bogomil (Ronny Cox) of the Beverly Hills Police Department does not trust Foley, and hinders his search for evidence.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop II
programme.desc: The hard-nosed Detroit cop returns to Los Angeles to help solve another case. This time he must direct his efforts towards unraveling the Alphabet Crimes, a series of robberies committed by leather-jacketed punks. The investigation puts him on the trail of an illegal arms dealer and his hit lady.

programme.title: Beverly Hills Cop III
programme.desc: When his boss is killed, Detroit cop Alex Foley (Eddie Murphy) finds evidence that the murderer had ties to a California amusement park called Wonder World. Returning to Beverly Hills once more, Foley reunites with Detective Billy Rosewood (Judge Reinhold) to solve the case. Along with Billy's new partner, Jon Flint (Hctor Elizondo), they discover that the security force of Wonder World is actually part of a counterfeit money operation headed by park manager Orrin Sanderson (John Saxon).

programme.title: 48 HRS.
programme.desc: Renegade cop Jack Cates (Nick Nolte) pulls bank robber Reggie Hammond (Eddie Murphy) from a federal prison on a 48-hour leave to help him capture Hammond's old partner, Albert Ganz (James Remar). Having escaped from a prison work crew, Ganz is on a killing spree around San Francisco, on the trail of half a million dollars that went missing after one of his robberies. The cocky Reggie knows where the money is, but spars with the hotheaded Jack as he enjoys his temporary freedom.

programme.title: Another 48 Hrs.
programme.desc: Jack Cates once again enlists the aid of ex-con Reggie Hammond. This time it is to take down The Iceman, a ruthless drug lord operating in the San Francisco Bay Area.

programme.title: Don Friesen
programme.desc: Husband. Idiot. Dad. His kids think he's fun. His wife thinks he's an idiot. Audiences think he's hilarious! Don is a modern suburban dad just trying to raise his kids and get through the day with a bit of money in the bank and a scrap of dignity intact. With a unique style that can best be described as frenetic and engaging, Don captures the irony of parenting, marriage and everyday absurdities through characters, voices, parodies and some of the best written routines around. He's a wanna-be geek who constantly upgrades to the latest technology, but can never get it to work, leading to signature bits about tech support, Idiots Guides, texting and passwords. Friesen has recently taken his smart, savvy, and highly-caffeinated comedy to the stage at the Alex Theatre in Glendale, CA, for the taping of his new Showtime one-hour special titled "Ask Your Mom." In his first nationally released concert special, Don delivers a winning hour of clever, true-to-life "he's talking about my family up there" comedy that manages to be adult-smart yet family-friendly.

programme.title: Andy Gold
programme.desc: Andy Gold has appeared in festivals and competitions all over the country, including the Boston Comedy Festival, San Diego Comedy Festival, Laugh Your Asheville Off and Comcast's Trial by Laughter Comedy Festival. Andy's comedy has also been featured on Hulu and Kevin Hart's Laugh out Loud network on Sirius XM.

programme.title: Vinnie Montez
programme.desc: Growing up, Vinnie Montez always wanted to be a police officer, a dream that he realized in 1998. His experiences as a cop are the foundation for his comedy you just can't make some of this stuff up.

programme.title: Reno Collier
programme.desc: Reno's journey began at the Punchline Comedy Club in Atlanta, GA where he tended bar to supplement his day job. He found himself on stage during the weekly open mic night. His unique outlook on life - mixed with a six-pack, was instantly popular.

programme.title: Phil Kopczynski
programme.desc: Phil Kopczynski is a reluctant nice guy and father who just wants to occasionally play in the wilderness and regularly make city-dwellers laugh.

programme.title: Tom Simmons: Peace, Love and Whatnot
Kabir Singh
programme.desc: Energetic and in-your-face comedian Kabir Singh jokes about why serial killers are white, Indian stereotypes, and why Siri's racist.

programme.title: Andrew Rivers
programme.desc: Andrew's very personal and fun storytelling comedy, combined with his exemplary work ethic has earned him high praise from some of the best comedians in the business. Andrew is a featured writer, actor, and comedian on the TV show UpLate NW. Andrew has been featured on NBC, FOX, and the Bob & Tom Radio Show and is a regular opening act for Christopher Titus. Andrew was also featured on the popular Buzzfeed web series Truth or Drink, has performed in over 35 states and his new podcast called Don't Quit Your Night Job was featured in the Seattle Times.

programme.title: Keith Stubbs
programme.desc: Keith Stubbs is a 'triple threat' in showbiz and entertainment. He's a hilarious stand-up comedian, talented actor, and award-winning radio personality.Keith was twice voted 'Best Comedian' by City Weekly, the Standard-Examiner named him 'Funniest Comic' and he was a semi-finalist in Comedy Central's Laugh Riots comedy competition. The Utah-based comic has made television appearances on A&E's An Evening at the Improv, nationally syndicated Comedy.TV, ABC's America's Funniest People and has established himself as a funny, improvisational comic, host, roastmaster and emcee.Keith tours nationally and has shared the stage with showbiz legends Joan Rivers, Jeff Foxworthy, Bill Cosby, Jim Gaffigan, Sinbad, Gladys Knight, and Frank Caliendo. Keith was one of five comedians who performed for the athletes in the Olympic Village at the 2002 Winter Games.Keith was named Best Actor by City Weekly for his show-stopping, comedic performance as 'Vinnie Black' in the stage production of Tony 'n Tina's Wedding. Stubbs currently plays Rob Schneider's accountant in the TV series "Real Rob" on Netflix.For eight consecutive years, Keith was awarded "Best Radio Personality" by the Utah Broadcasters' Association for his time spent as host of "The Stubbs Show" on 101.5 The Eagle. He also hosted KEITH STUBBS SPORTS on ESPN700 in Salt Lake City and appeared nationally on CMT radio and the Blue Collar Comedy channel on SiriusXM.Keith is often recognized for being a clean comedian, although his audiences span a broad spectrum. One review said, "Keith was funny, period! He was clean but we hardly noticed because his comedy and style are so unique and spot on."

programme.title: Lucas Bohn
programme.desc: LUCAS BOHN is energetic with an edge. The perfect blend of schoolboy charm and bad-boy charisma, his comedy is both smart and audacious. Known as the little guy who generates big laughs, Lucas has shared the stage with Dave Chappelle, Jimmy Fallon, and Kevin Hart. Lucas' high-energy shows and hilarious impersonations make him an instant hit with audiences of all ages. In 2013 Lucas was nominated "Comedian of the Year" by Campus Activities Magazine.

programme.title: Andy Woodhull
programme.desc: Andy recently appeared on Conan on TBS. Around that same time,his half-hour special premiered on Comedy Central.He was the first comedian to make his network television debut onThe Tonight Showstarring Jimmy Fallon. He also appeared on Comics Unleashed with Byron Allen, and Gotham Comedy Live on AXS.He had alsoappeared on Comedy Central'sLive at Gotham in 2009.

programme.title: Card Sharks
programme.desc: This show from legendary Mark Goodson-Bill Todman Productions features two contestants trying to predict answers to survey questions for the opportunity to play a game with oversized playing cards for a chance to win cash. One contestant guesses how many people (out of 100) gave a certain answer to a question and the other contestant then guesses if the number is higher or lower than the opponent's guess. The winning contestant then faces a row of cards and must determine if each succeeding card is higher or lower than the one that precedes it. The contestant who wins two out of three games wins the match and plays the bonus round, called Money Cards. The Money Cards round is similar to the card game in the main game but with three levels of cards instead of one row. The contestant is given $200 at the beginning of Money Cards and wagers any or all of that money when guessing if the cards will be higher or lower than the previous one. A perfect round could earn the contestant $28,800.

programme.title: Angry Planet | Space
programme.desc: We break the bounds of earth, and look at the environment of space. We examine the difficulties and challenges of exploring this most challenging environment. George experiences some of the extreme training needed for space travel aboard a Czech-built Albatross fighter jet, the Zero-G plane, and a centrifuge producing 6 G's of force, and witnesses the launch of a flight to the International Space Station.

programme.title: Angry Planet | Polynesian Volcanoes
programme.desc: Filming the volcanoes, mudpools and geysers in the geothermic wonderland of New Zealand's north island, we learn that a new island is being created by an undersea volcano 1000 miles north in Tonga. Determined to be among the first to see this newest land on earth, we head for the remote island by plane and boat, after various nautical mishaps, George ends up, bedraggled and clad in nothing but underwear and a lifejacket, honored to be one of the very first to explore this brand new island.

programme.title: Angry Planet | Under Pressure
programme.desc: It's dark, it's cold, there is no air to breath and everything is under extreme pressure. George begins his exploration of the deep with a well-preserved shipwreck in the st.lawrence River, then heads west to dive with undersea explorers Chris Harvey-Clark and Phil Nuyyton, and investigate the newly discovered Black Smoker deepsea vents. The show climaxes in Curacao, where we dive to 1000 feet aboard Nuyyton's newest submersible.

programme.title: Angry Planet | Antarctica
programme.desc: George returns to the Fin Del Mundo at the southern tip of Argentina, this time to sail on a Russian icebreaker to Antarctica. After braving the stormy Drake passage, he explores volcanic Deception Island, camps out in the Antarctic snow, and paddles a kayak through icebergs calved off the melting glaciers.

programme.title: WS Viral Wild | Ep. 1.13
programme.desc: Those that thrive beneath the waves teach us to go with the flow.

programme.title: WS Viral Wild | Ep. 2.5
programme.desc: From oceans to rivers to kiddie pools, aquatic life finds a way.

programme.title: Storm Hunters | Dangerous Waters
programme.desc: The North Atlantic Ocean is generous with her bounty, until she takes a life in return. Mark braves the deep seas on the most dangerous day of the lobster fishing season.

programme.title: Storm Hunters | Into the Core
programme.desc: One year after witnessing a record number of deadly twisters in Tornado Alley, Mark & Jaclyn return to the Midwest in search of more extreme storms. The hunt challenges their relationship with Mother Nature, as well as with each other.

programme.title: Angry Planet | Costa Rica
programme.desc: Costa Rica is a tiny country jammed with diversity and adventure. George explores the volcanoes of Costa Rica with an international team of scientists, rafts down whitewater rivers in full flood, canyoneers down raging waterfalls, and handles some of deadliest snakes this tropical country has to offer.

programme.title: Angry Planet | Highway to Hail
programme.desc: George and three side-kicks head straight into the Bearcage, looking to get beat up by the biggest, baddest hailstones that Texas and Oklahoma can throw at them. They find it and their stormchasing vehicles don't look too pretty after coming through these massive storms.

programme.title: Angry Planet | Arctic Winter
programme.desc: George links up with two experienced polar adventurers to explore the frigid Canadian arctic in the depths of winter. The team first uses skis to cross the fractured sea ice of Frobisher Bay, then dog teams to head north through the spectacular Auyuittuq Mountains.

programme.title: Angry Planet | Eco-Disasters
programme.desc: No-one creates eco-disasters on quite the scale of the former Soviet Union. In Uzbekistan, the Aral Sea, once one of the largest freshwater lakes in the world, has seen its waters diverted, so that it has shrunk to 1/6 its previous size. In Crimea, a mountain has been carved into a james bondian submarine base. In northern Ukraine, the Chernobyl nuclear site has been reduced to a radioactive wasteland.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.sub-title: Baby Einstein: Let's Learn about Seasons
programme.desc: Enjoy the best of summer, autumn and winter with Baby Einstein! Discover the familiar sights and sounds of the different seasons. Learn names of common objects associated with each through repetition and narration and see engaging images of whimsical toys that celebrate each. Discover the magic of each season from falling leaves, rolling beach balls and even snowmen.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Isn't the world exciting?! Learn about things found in nature like flowers, grass, trees, and leaves with real-life footage and narration. Sing-along to popular nursery rhymes and learn about common bedtime themes. Teach baby how to say words like eat, milk, and all done verbally and through sign language. Discover words and activities about playtime and friendship.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Get moving with Baby Einstein! Real, live-action footage and classical melodies engage young viewers as they discover simple words related to movement. Enjoy encouraging melodies and live-action footage of babies and animals as you learn and move alongside your favorite Baby Einstein friends. Dance along as you watch real, live action footage of animals, children, and toys.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: World Music introduces you and your little one to beautiful sounds from every continent, bringing a fresh, new experience of music and culture. Sing, dance and play to exotic rhythms that open the door to an appreciation of different cultures from around the world.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Take your little explorer on an exotic musical expedition to meet wild animals from across the globe. Journey to the jungle, savannah, desert and forest.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: As little ones grow, their innate sense of wonder grows too, creating an occasion for celebration with each new discovery. Baby Galileo Discovering the Sky introduces them to that remarkable canopy above us: the sun and moon, fluffy clouds, shimmering stars, colorful planets and whirling galaxies.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Baby's innate curiosity about all they see and hear increases on a daily basis. Before long, they begin to associate words with objects and to imitate and articulate sounds. Why not give their eyes and ears something wonderful to feast upon? Baby Shakespeare presents little ones with 12 common words that can be found within the rich context of classic poems and the beauty of nature.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.sub-title: Baby Einstein: Let's Learn About Animals Around the World
programme.desc: Meet fascinating animals from across the globe! Dance and sing along with puppets and discover some of the world's most unique creatures. Join us to dance along to classical melodies as we learn animal names through narration and repetition or simply enjoy seeing live-action footage.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.sub-title: Baby MacDonald: A Day On the Farm
programme.desc: As little ones' curiosity about the world blossoms, you can help sow the seeds of discovery with Baby MacDonald: A Day on the Farm. Featuring live-action images, nursery rhymes and fun-filled puppet shows, this playful, interactive program introduces little ones to the exciting sights and sounds of a real working farm.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: World Music introduces you and your little one to beautiful sounds from every continent, bringing a fresh, new experience of music and culture. Sing, dance and play to exotic rhythms that open the door to an appreciation of different cultures from around the world.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: Your little one will want to keep a beat, snap his fingers and march his feet! Join new characters Pillie, the musical woodpecker, and Coco, the dancing cockatoo, and share the excitement of rhythm with your baby. World of Rhythm explores rhythm in music, rhythm in nature and rhythm as a form of expression.

programme.title: Baby Einstein
programme.desc: From the moment babies are born, they use their developing senses to discover the world. In terms of sight, bold patterns in contrasting colors or black and white are initially preferred. As for sounds, Mother s gentle voice, in any language, is music to baby's ears. Language Nursery: Voices From Many Lands acquaints your baby with the sounds of foreign language by presenting delightful, visually stimulating images accompanied by spoken passages, natural sounds and music.

It's a simple, sweet rhyme about the magic of making wishes on falling stars. She tries a few different rhymes as she goes, noting them on her paper. Covered in goop and debris, Rumble scares them into thinking he's the Beast! Avery hatches a plan to trap the "Beast" and save Rumble, who's gone missing

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.sub-title: The Camping Trip // Like Father Like Son
programme.desc: Rev can't wait to take Avery camping. But when he learns they're trying a new campsite for the first time ever, he is disappointed-what if the new campsite isn't as fun...or worse...boring?! It's up to Avery to get him excited for a new adventure! // Rev wants to be just like his dad, so he and Rumble attempt Ben and Duke's usual tasks. They're disappointed when they aren't strong enough to tackle the big jobs the way Ben would, but sometimes, a little Rev magic and Rumble power are even better!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.sub-title: The Green Phantom // Over Easy Does It
programme.desc: Rev is sure he has the perfect plan to catch an elusive frog, but Avery isn't so sure. After all of his attempts fall through, he's finally ready to accept help-and Avery's idea just might work! Will they finally catch the Green Phantom? // Rev and Avery compete to transport supplies to town for a big event. Avery is faster, so Rev tries to take a short cut to get ahead-but an obstacle stops him in his tracks. How will he finish his delivery in time, let alone win the competition?

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.desc: Rev and Avery go on an adventure to discover the Crystal Cavern. As they enter the first cave, a swarm of bats scare Rumble so much, he takes off through a maze of tunnels! They can't worry about the Crystal Cavern-they have to find Rumble first! // When Molly tells a campfire story about the Fender Bend Beast, the kids' imaginations run wild. Covered in goop and debris, Rumble scares them into thinking he's the Beast! Avery hatches a plan to trap the "Beast" and save Rumble, who's gone missing

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.sub-title: Winter Bestival // The Mystery of Missing Trees
programme.desc: After a snowstorm, Rev and Avery compete for title of Champion of the Winter Bestival! Avery is determined to hold her title from last year. Rev's Dad suggests a "slow and steady" approach to win, but Rev can't resist using "Rumble power!" // When Rumble wakes Rev in the middle of the night, they hear a strange sound, and see lights in the forest. The next day, Ben encourages them to investigate further. Rev and his friends follow the trail of missing trees to discover the truth!

programme.title: Rev and Roll
programme.sub-title: The Wild Wheelin' Stunt Park // The Castle of Fender Bend
programme.desc: When damage from a storm threatens to cancel the Wild Wheelin' Stunt Park Skills Contest, Owen is disappointed he won't get to compete. Rev leads the kids in the Stunt Park clean-up, and soon discovers that this is really an opportunity in disguise! // Rev and the gang make their own castle and play as knights of old. But when their sticks and building supplies begin to disappear, Bo leads them into a medieval battle of wits with the culprit-a cranky beaver!

programme.title: Helper Car
programme.desc: Cartoon for kids about helper cars: a fire truck, an ambulance, a police car and a tow truck. Why these cars and trucks are useful? Because they help people and other cars: fire truck can put out fire, ambulance helps people, when they are hurt or sick, it could drive them to the hospital. Police car patrols the city. Tow truck help other cars, when they are broken down. Watch new car cartoon and learn about helper cars!

programme.title: TurboZaurs
programme.desc: The adventures of dinosaur's squad transforming into big machines who are willing to solve any difficulties that kids may face in their everyday life.

programme.title: Tommy the Little Dragon
programme.desc: Tommy is a soft toy who lives with an ordinary panda family. Panda parents have no idea about him, while their cubs cannot live a day without Tommy! With the help of his magic soap bubbles, Tommy teleports kids to wonderful universes full of adventures, to help them discover a vast and captivating world, fight their fears and inhibitions, and learn important family values.

programme.title: Mya Go
programme.desc: Mya Go is a preschool animated show about a young girl whose enthusiasm infects everyone around her. Set in the bustling town of Everyday, Mya Go lives here with the Go family and lives nearby her closest friends.

programme.title: Robocar POLI
programme.desc: Robocar POLI - Try not to hurry & I want to be praised.: School B is late and he is worried about the children who are waiting for him. He looks for the short cut. However every roads are blocked because of roadwork.

programme.title: Princess Play Time
programme.desc: The proud Princess likes to do things her own way, but her antics are always joined by her restless brother, Prince, who tends to turn everything topsy-turvy. Any playtime in their room transforms into a fantastic journey through unusual worlds: the children arrange a picnic on the Moon, conduct a detective investigation in a toy city, or search for pirate treasures on islands! Although initially, the Princess and Prince seem to clash and compete, by the end, they always find joy in each other's company and that of their cherished dog, Bona.

programme.title: Pins and Nettie
programme.desc: Pins and Nettie are besties and there is nothing they like more than going on adventures together, most of time.

programme.title: Counting With Paula
programme.desc: The show features Paula and her friends, Tim, Billy, Chalky, Calc, and the Numbers as they go on exciting adventures in colorful and exotic places. From the Amazon jungles to the deepest oceans, and to the hottest deserts, Paula and friends solve problems, have fun and make more friends along the way!

programme.title: Kids Planet
programme.desc: Wow, I Never Knew That! is a whimsical, half-hour television series that is jam-packed.

programme.title: Play with Cocobi
programme.desc: Color play, dance, and more. Let's have fun with Cocobi!

programme.title: Timmy Time
programme.desc: Being an only lamb in the flock' Timmy has been used to getting his own way. Now for the first time Timmy is going to have to learn to get along with other little animals. Timmy is going to Nursery! Self-willed and naughty Timmy is going to have to learn how to share things with other youngsters and think about their feelings not just his. Timmy is a gifted little footballer who needs to learn that it's not enough to kick the ball you have to pass it too. Harriet Heron and Osbourne Owl, who run the Nursery are going to have their hands full, but Timmy gets it right in the end with a little help from his friends of the furry, feathery and spikey type.

programme.title: Baby Einstein Classics
programme.desc: As little ones grow, so does their awareness of the world around them. In this season, discover and learn about animals, starting with the ones that your children may encounter at home, to farm animals, all the way to the most unique of creatures from all 7 continents!

programme.desc: Shaq's Garage - Band Aid / Marooned: Three kids that Shaq has mentored in the Boys & Girls Club have a band but they can't find a ride to their first live show. Shaq sends Gronk, Bates and Boone to go get each kid but they have some challenges on the way to the club. When they finally get there, more bad news may keep the show from going on as planned. The Shaq Paq are determined to figure out a way to help the kids perform. / Hattie, a friend of Shaq, shows off her new hot air balloon business. Himari, Gronk, and Fleming decided to climb in, but a sudden wind gust rips out the anchor and carries them away. Stranded on a deserted island, the trio must find a way to survive until Shaq and the rest of the Paq can rescue them.

programme.title: Shaq's Garage
programme.desc: Shaq's Garage - Roadsterball / Blond is Back!: Klaus' longtime nemesis, Niccolo Tessio, challenges the Paq to a game of Roadsterball. Team leader Klaus only chooses the fastest and strongest of the Paq to help, but it doesn't go the way he planned. Klaus must figure out a way to utilize all of the strengths of the Paq members or they'll loose the game. / Shaq has a big surprise for Fleming. He's invited the actor who played James Blond, Ian Connery, to come visit. Ian always wished they could have gone on a real mission together and Fleming feels the same way.

programme.desc: Superhero Kindergarten - Super K's Vs The Fearsome Foursome: The Super K's meet their arch-nemeses, the Fearsome Foursome, and learn about the importance of perseverance.

programme.title: FriendsReunite
programme.desc: Olly about how his obsession is affecting their relationships. Olly refuses to see the damage he's causing, but it becomes clear that he's lost touch with what really matters.

programme.title: All Of Nothing
programme.desc: The ninja and Sensei Wu try to infiltrate the Serpentines' inner sanctum and walk right into a trap, and when Lloyd's rescue mission fails, there is only one person who can help them, namely the evil Lord Garmadon but can they trust him?

programme.title: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes: Maximum Overload
programme.desc: Spider-Man and Marvel's Super Heroes take on a mischievous Loki and a team of super villains in an all-new LEGO adventure

programme.title: Back To School
programme.desc: When the NEXO-Knights are sloppy in a fight with Jestro, Merlok 2.0 sends them back to the Knights' Academy. Not only for a brush-up but to find out what Jestro is after in its hallowed halls. As they Knights battle Jestro in a somewhat haphazard and lazy way they discuss the fact that Jestro never wins and that they're always getting over on him. Despite defeating the jerky Jester and his evil Book, Merlok 2.0 discovers that something about the attack on the village is tied to the Knights' Academy. It looks like that's where they'll strike next. It wouldn't hurt for the Knights to go back to school to watch for Jestro and for some refresher training. Merlok is sure Jestro wants something at the Academy, but he doesn't know what it is. The Knights are very much fish out of water at the academy, even with the cool kids Robin and Ava showing them around. The next generation of Knights is being taught to integrate the NEXO-Magic of Merlok into their fighting techniques and these kids are good (so good, they initially kick the lazy, know-it-all Knight's butts!) Their old principal, the ever-ornery Headmaster Brickland, sets them straight: they're all still slackers, and they better get their acts together (especially Lance!) The Knights take shifts as library helpers much to the delight of the old squirebot librarian, MARGE. They're convinced Jestro is after a bookisn't he always after a book? When Jestro attacks, the Knights help organize the students and there's a big fight in the Academy Library versus Jestro and his Monsters. They drive Jestro off without letting him steal any books! Victory! But as Jestro leaves, we see him holding what the Book of Monsters really wanted: a snow globe with a castle in it that was sitting on the librarian's desk. In the Lava Lands, Jestro throws the snow globe into a volcano and it frees the massive Castle of Monstrux from its snowy magic prison

programme.title: The CHI Jackers
programme.desc: The Wolves have become strong because of the stolen CHI. And now they are stealing even more. Soon all the other tribes of CHIMA have none. Laval and Eris must find a new, clever and Wolf proof way to get CHI to the tribes.

programme.title: Symptoms!
programme.desc: Owen falls prey to the toxin of a poisonous prehistoric jungle flower and believes he's a raptor.

programme.title: Snow Way
programme.desc: Practicing for the local snow lodge's big snowboard race, Mia has an accident and hurts her ankle. She insists it's no biggie, but when she tries to resume practice, the normally fearless Mia finds she's now terrified of snowboarding! At the local snow lodge's Snowboard Meet, ace snowboarder Mia, trying to raise money for a new Heartlake City animal shelter, enters the fiercest race of all the Boardercross. Then, while practicing, she has an accident and hurts her ankle. She insists it's no big deal, but once she heals and tries to resume practice, the usually fearless Mia finds she's now terrified of snowboarding! With the help of her Friends, she tries hard to overcome her fear, but her nightmarish visions of snowboard monsters and jeering snowmen have her shaking in her bed. She backs out of the race, disappointing her Friends and herself. Finally, when an avalanche traps Fiona, Mia is forced to overcome her fears and race to the rescue.

programme.title: The Shape of Motion
programme.desc: Arin's quest to find his parents takes an unexpected turn when he and the Ninja stumble upon a baby dragon in need.

programme.title: Enter the City of Temples
programme.desc: Breaking into the heavily guarded City of Temples, they must prove their worth to secure a spot in the tournament.

programme.title: Legacy, Vehicle and Mechs
programme.desc: Zane takes help from Nya for backup memories of their adventures to the Samurai X Cave computer, but Zane encounters a mysterious puzzle buried deep within his code. Nya digitizes Jay and uploads him into Zane's mind. Jay reviews memories of the Ninja's various motorcycles, mechs and planes in order to solve the vehicle-themed puzzle.

programme.title: Spit Take!
programme.desc: A Dilophosaurus runs loose in the park's hotel, and Owen and Claire must find it before the guests notice - and before Vic's dino-hunting security team can damage the hotel and the guests.

programme.title: Grim Vengeance
programme.desc: The Never Witch's ambitions have darkened, leading her to target the Grim Realm. In an unlikely alliance, the dream chasers must join forces with the Nightmare King and his grimspawn minions.

programme.title: Crown Control
programme.desc: The dream chasers stumble upon the fabled Crown of Control with surprising ease, thanks to an unexpected encounter with the King of the Creatures.

programme.title: The Promised Crown Affair

programme.title: FriendsReunite
programme.desc: Olly about how his obsession is affecting their relationships. Olly refuses to see the damage he's causing, but it becomes clear that he's lost touch with what really matters.

programme.title: All Of Nothing
programme.desc: The ninja and Sensei Wu try to infiltrate the Serpentines' inner sanctum and walk right into a trap, and when Lloyd's rescue mission fails, there is only one person who can help them, namely the evil Lord Garmadon but can they trust him?

programme.title: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes: Maximum Overload
programme.desc: Spider-Man and Marvel's Super Heroes take on a mischievous Loki and a team of super villains in an all-new LEGO adventure

programme.title: Back To School
programme.desc: When the NEXO-Knights are sloppy in a fight with Jestro, Merlok 2.0 sends them back to the Knights' Academy. Not only for a brush-up but to find out what Jestro is after in its hallowed halls. As they Knights battle Jestro in a somewhat haphazard and lazy way they discuss the fact that Jestro never wins and that they're always getting over on him. Despite defeating the jerky Jester and his evil Book, Merlok 2.0 discovers that something about the attack on the village is tied to the Knights' Academy. It looks like that's where they'll strike next. It wouldn't hurt for the Knights to go back to school to watch for Jestro and for some refresher training. Merlok is sure Jestro wants something at the Academy, but he doesn't know what it is. The Knights are very much fish out of water at the academy, even with the cool kids Robin and Ava showing them around. The next generation of Knights is being taught to integrate the NEXO-Magic of Merlok into their fighting techniques and these kids are good (so good, they initially kick the lazy, know-it-all Knight's butts!) Their old principal, the ever-ornery Headmaster Brickland, sets them straight: they're all still slackers, and they better get their acts together (especially Lance!) The Knights take shifts as library helpers much to the delight of the old squirebot librarian, MARGE. They're convinced Jestro is after a bookisn't he always after a book? When Jestro attacks, the Knights help organize the students and there's a big fight in the Academy Library versus Jestro and his Monsters. They drive Jestro off without letting him steal any books! Victory! But as Jestro leaves, we see him holding what the Book of Monsters really wanted: a snow globe with a castle in it that was sitting on the librarian's desk. In the Lava Lands, Jestro throws the snow globe into a volcano and it frees the massive Castle of Monstrux from its snowy magic prison

programme.title: Sonic the Hedgehog, Adventures of

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: The Shane Gang return home to the 99 caverns to find Gateway Cavern overrun with slugs-in Eli's absence, the Shadow Clan have governed by putting the slugs before the people, and the result is chaos! It's up to Eli to restore the balance, but the Shadow Clan aren't as friendly as they once were...and that's saying something. Help comes from an unexpected source-Tad and his slug Pieper, who just arrived from the Surface!

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: Tad is still missing after the slug-out with the Shadow Clan, but the Gang have to set off without him when reports start coming in of slugs disappearing all across the 99 caverns. As they pursue the trail of missing slugs, the mystery grows darker when it leads them straight to Dr. Blakk's old stronghold!

programme.title: Slugterra
programme.desc: Tad's hypnotic slug Pieper has gone megamorph, his gang of supporters all have Gattler blasters, and Tad's control over his army of ghouls is stronger than Dr. Blakk's ever was. Eli refuses to let his slug or any other get ghouled, so the team breaks in to Blakk's fortress to free them. While inside, they learn of Blakk's plan to conquer Slugterra.

programme.title: Paper Tales
programme.desc: Animation series Paper Tales narrate to children audience in fascinating way amusing adventures of paper animals a moose named Aristotle and a woodpecker named Knock-Knock in paper land where everything is made only from paper. Merry adventures come together with entertaining insets for crafty hands when the audience learns how to produce all cartoon characters using paper, cardboard, scissors and glue. The project is supported with the site where all flat patterns are provided with the advices how to manufacture the paper world items.This is the way spectator gets involved into a peculiar game that brings out creative work and development of many useful practical skills, distracting kids from permanent attachment to a computer. The Paper Tales project is a fascinating and helpful alternative to computer-oriented pastime. The whole cartoon is accompanied by off-screen narrator's text and exuberant flow of gags. Each episode is planned to last for 5 minutes (a version without insets 4 minutes). Technique of performance is 3D computer graphics imitating paper application work.

In this series, former NASA employee Emily Calandrelli visits some of the agency's facilities, private companies and universities to speak with people knowledgeable about the topic to help "show off the coolest aspects of the space industry," to use her words. Technology, a potential manned mission to Mars and planetary tourism are some themes.

programme.title: Wes Montgomery
programme.desc: This selection of unforgettable performances by some of the most iconic and influential jazz guitarists in history showcases these legends' unique essence. Revel in Wes Montgomery's virtuosity as he performs the captivating Nica's Dream in Holland in 1965, and delight in the expressive beauty of his rendition of Here's That Rainy Day, recorded in London in that same year. Experience the timeless appeal of Joe Pass's You Stepped Out of a Dream and You Turned The Tables on Me, recorded live in Hanover in 1975. The interplay between Jim Hall and Atilla Zoller borders on the impossible as they perform Extensions in Hanover in 1973. Enjoy Jim Hall's lyrical solo performance of I'm Getting Sentimental Over You from 1964. Witness Sonny Sharrock's avant-garde fusion of jazz and rock in an exhilarating performance of Peanut", recorded live in France in 1970. Sharrock is joined by flutist Herbie Mann in a soulful performance of Memphis Underground from 1969. Immerse yourself in the magic of jazz guitar!

programme.title: Cannonball Adderley, Nat Adderley, Yusuf Lateef & Joe Zawinul
programme.desc: Cannonball Adderley: Live in '63 boasts two beautifully filmed concerts from one of the most celebrated sextets in jazz history, captured at the top of their game. Cannonball Adderley (alto sax), Nat Adderley (cornet), and the masterful Yusef Lateef (tenor sax, flute, oboe), provide a massive three-horn frontline attack, while the stellar rhythm section featuring a pre-Weather Report Joe Zawinul (piano), Sam Jones (bass), and Louis Hayes (drums) fuel the songs with a deep infectious swing. Quincy Jones' "Jessica's Day" leaps from the gate with a huge big band sound that is extraordinary for only six musicians. This recording is a reminder that Cannonball Adderley was one of the most outstanding and highly respected alto saxophonists in the history of jazz. He was a bluesy jazzman who could play anything in superb fashion.

programme.title: Rahsaan Roland Kirk
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Avishai Cohen
programme.desc: Double bassist Avishai Cohen's trio with Noam David (drums) and Omri Mor (pianist) joined forces with the international Symphony Orchestra INSO-Lviv', conducted by Christian Schumann. On June 24, 2017 they brought Avishai Cohen's signature blend of influences from Eastern Europe, American jazz and the Middle East to the Alfa Jazz Festival in Lviv, Ukraine. Cohen, who also supplies vocalizations in the Judeo-Spanish dialect Ladino, came to prominence internationally in the 1990s when jazz great Chick Corea offered him a place in his trio and a recording deal. Thirty years later, Cohen has become a house-hold name himself, leaving his Ukrainian audience enthralled and connected through the universal language of music.

programme.title: Coleman Hawkins
programme.desc: An extraordinary collection of clips in all jazz genres from the most beautiful concerts and the most special festivals, performed by the finest jazz musicians.

programme.title: Charles Mingus, Jaki Byard, Dannie Richmond & Johnny Coles
programme.sub-title: Charles Mingus And Eric Dolphy live in Lige
programme.desc: Charles Mingus showcases an exceptional concert performed in April 1965 featuring his most celebrated lineup: Jaki Byard (piano), Dannie Richmond (drums), Johnny Coles (trumpet), Clifford Jordan (tenor sax) and the great Eric Dolphy (alto sax, flute and bass clarinet). Recorded within an eight-day span, less than three months before Dolphy's death, the three concerts showcase Mingus's visionary leadership and the band's incredible depth and diversity with unique performances and arrangements of classics including So Long Eric' and the groundbreaking Meditations On Integration'.

programme.title: Lianne La Havas
programme.desc: Lianne La Havas' performance at Casino de Paris captures the British singer-songwriter at her best: with her crystalline voice she performs soulful melodies full of sincerity. The performance is part of La Havas' 'Blood Tour', a concert tour promoting her second album 'Blood' (2015). She is accompanied by James Wyatt on keys, Adam Prendergast on bass, Giles King Ashong on drums, and Frida Touray on backing vocals.

programme.title: Christian Scott, Lawrence Fields, Braxton Cook & Kris Funn
programme.desc: In just a few years, young trumpet player Christian Scott has become synonymous with a new jazz generation. He shakes up the conventions of jazz by taking the genre to new horizons and reaching a wider audience. No doubt, at 33 years old, Christian Scott is already forging his own path. After each record release, he seems even more determined to challenge the rules of jazz with his own avant-garde style. At his 2018 show at La Cooprative de Mai, Christian Scott celebrates 100 years of jazz with the program The Centennial Trilogy. Expect a unique performance in an intimate theatre setting, shot in native 4K!

programme.title: Quatuor Ebne
programme.desc: Renowned French string quartet Quatuor bne marked the 250th birth anniversary of Ludwig van Beethoven (1770-1827) with a remarkable project: recording all of the great composer's sixteen string quartets. For five years, violinists Pierre Colombet and Gabriel Le Magadure, violist Marie Chilemme, and cellist Raphal Merlin immersed themselves in Beethoven's 650 pages of sheet music. Their efforts culminated in the performance of the composer's complete repertoire for string quartet, which covers three decades of Beethoven's musical creativity, during six impressive concerts at Philharmonie de Paris in the autumn of 2020. Quatuor bne explored every facet of Beethoven's string quartet repertoire: from the youthful Opus 18 string quartets to the Razumovsky, Harp, and Serioso quartets (Opus 59, 74, and 95) from his middle period, and finally, the depth of his late quartets (Opus 127 to 135). This program features Quatuor bne performing Beethoven's String Quartet No. 1 in F major, Op. 18, No. 1 String Quartet No. 10 in E-flat major, Op. 74, "Harp" and String Quartet No. 9 in C major, Op. 59, No. 3, "Razumovsky". This concert performance was recorded at Philharmonie de Paris on October 13, 2020.

programme.title: Pavel Milyukov & Boris Berezovsky
programme.sub-title: Works for violin by Franck, Faur, Schubert a.o.
programme.desc: Russian violinist Pavel Milyukov and pianist Boris Berezovsky join forces in this concert recorded at Tchaikovsky Concert Hall in Moscow, Russia, on October 15, 2020. Milyukov has won prizes at various international competitions and has appeared at venues throughout Europe. He forms an excellent chamber music duo with acclaimed pianist Boris Berezovsky. On this concert's program are Csar Franck's Sonata for violin and piano Gabriel Faur's Aprs un rve Alfred Schnittke's Stille Nacht and Franz Schubert's Erlknig. As an encore, the duo performs Russian Song' from Igor Stravinsky's opera Mavra (arranged by S. Dushkin).

programme.title: Daniel Barenboim
programme.desc: Cinematic classical clips and energizing concert pieces featuring up-and-coming artists.

programme.title: Les Dissonances & David Grimal
programme.sub-title: Brahms - Symphony No. 2 in D major, Op. 73
programme.desc: Les Dissonances is a collective of artists founded by violinist David Grimal in 2004. The conductorless ensemble consists of musicians from the most prestigious European orchestras, international soloists, and young talents. In this performance, Les Dissonances present Johannes Brahms's Symphony No. 2 in D major, Op. 73. Whereas it took the composer over a decade to complete his first symphony, he penned his Symphony No. 2 in just a few months, during his summer sojourn in the restful Austrian village of Prtschach in 1877. Nicknamed his Pastoral' symphony, the work is arguably the most sunny and optimistic of Brahms's four symphonies. Lyrical in character, it features joyful melodies. This performance was recorded at Philharmonie de Paris, France, in 2015.

programme.title: Martha Argerich, Lily Maisky, Iddo Bar-Shai & Tedi Papavrami
programme.sub-title: Martha Argerich A Birthday Celebration III
programme.desc: On the occasion of her 80th birthday, Argentinian pianist Martha Argerich explored chamber music repertoire in this wonderful concert, recorded at Chteau de Chantilly, France. The Grande Dame' of the piano is joined by various renowned artists, including pianists Lily Maisky and Iddo Bar-Sha, violinists Tedi Papavrami and Akiko Suwanai, her daughter Lyda Chen-Argerich on viola, and cellist Mischa Maisky. On the program are Felix Mendelssohn's Piano Trio No. 1 in D minor, Op. 49 Leo Janek's Violin Sonata Franz Schubert's Rondo in A major, D. 951 and Johannes Brahms's Piano Quartet No. 3 in C minor, Op. 60. These performances were recorded on May 4 and June 13, 2021.

programme.title: Ocean Vibes
programme.desc: Beneath the Sea a compilation of spectacular underwater images from around the world. Captured in exclusively in 8K digital, Beneath the Sea features an award-winning original score by Alan Williams.

programme.title: Ocean Vibes
programme.desc: Coral Kingdoms was filmed on the kaleidoscopic reefs of Indonesia and the Maldives Islands.

programme.title: Ocean Vibes
programme.desc: Forest in the Sea captures the unusual beauty of undersea kelp forests from Alaska to Southern California.

programme.title: Ocean Vibes
programme.desc: Bejeweled Fishes captures the spectacular beauty of fishes inhabiting the coral reefs of the Tropical Pacific.

programme.title: Flying Over Iceland 2
programme.desc: "Flying Over Iceland II: Summer in the Golden Circle" presents a serene aerial view of Iceland's south coast, starting at Skogafoss and moving to Vik, with black sand beaches, cliffs, and Vatnajkull glacier. Filmed in 2020, this 1-hour film features local wildlife and immersive music.

programme.title: Flying Over Oahu
programme.desc: "Flying Over Oahu" offers a 97-minute aerial journey over Oahu's iconic coastlines with nature sounds and music by Alex Smith (The Cynic Project). From Waikiki Beach to Turtle Bay, enjoy breathtaking 4K landscapes, ending with a stunning Waikiki sunset.

programme.title: Flying Over Kauai
programme.desc: "Flying Over Kauai" provides a soothing aerial journey over Hawaii's Garden Island, featuring the lush NaPali Coast, waterfalls, canyons, and beaches. Paired with new music by The Cynic Project and nature sounds, this 4K film offers a visually and sonically immersive experience.

programme.title: Flying Over Spanish Islands
programme.desc: In their first collaboration, cinematographer Stefan Zimmerman and Nature Relaxation producer David Huting present "Above the Spanish Islands." This 50-minute 4K aerial film captures Mallorca and the Canary Islands, set to ambient music by Diamans, Electus, and Michael St. Laurent.

programme.title: Flying Over Iceland
programme.desc: "Flying Over Iceland: Part I" provides a soothing aerial journey through eastern Iceland's fjords and valleys, starting at sunrise in Brei_dalsvik. Enjoy views of mists, a waterfall, and the Brei_dals' river, set to nature sounds and music by The Cynic Project, showcasing East Iceland's beauty.

programme.title: Bryce Canyon Relaxation

programme.title: Red, White, And Blue
programme.desc: Red, White, And Blue A vibrant art collection featuring patriotic palettes, bold expressions, and dynamic compositions that celebrate the American spirit, culture, and creativity honoring freedom, unity, and the diverse artistic voices.

programme.title: Featured Artists: Lauren Karp
programme.desc: Featured Artists E9: Lauren Karp Lauren Karp's work blends abstract landscapes with layered images, capturing the earth's rhythm through color, pattern, and light. Her pieces evoke fleeting moments reimagined through movement and emotion.

programme.title: Shades of Color: Shades Of Red
programme.desc: Shades of Color: Shades of Red (S1E3) Explore a vibrant, passionate art collection where the color red takes center stage. The works showcase red's emotive power, from fiery abstract paintings to crimson-hued photographs, offering a visual journey through the spectrum of human emotions.

programme.title: Dreamscapes
